info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 11:44AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 1215 PM MST... At 1143 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Miami, or near Globe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 240 and 251. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 214 and 221. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
